Tetun (tdt): Nia lee jornál STL.
English (eng): He reads the STL newspaper.
Mambai (mgm): Urá le jornal STL.

Tetun (tdt): Nia la prienxe rekezitu.
English (eng): He didn't meet the requirements.
Mambai (mgm): Urá ba priense rekizitu.

Tetun (tdt): Iha foho Ramelau nia tutun, malirin loos.
English (eng): On the summit of Mount Ramelau it is very cold.
Mambai (mgm): Ni foho Ramelau tete, bisa dlo.

Tetun (tdt): Ema hetok barak tan.
English (eng): People increased in number.
Mambai (mgm): Ro niri tan lea.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u haree ó oin kamutis loos ne'e. Ó moras karik?
English (eng): I see you face is very pale. Are you sick?
Mambai (mgm): Au pei o ahe kbutis dlo. O moras hal?

Tetun (tdt): Uluk ema oho mate Timor oan barak iha funu laran.
English (eng): Many Timorese people were killed during the war.
Mambai (mgm): Muna ro bob Timor-ana niri ni funu lala.

Tetun (tdt): Tia prosesa ai-nanás sai marmelada.
English (eng): Auntie processes pineapple to make jam.
Mambai (mgm): Tia prosesa ainanas sai la marmelada.

Tetun (tdt): Timor-leste hetan indepedénsia iha loron 20 fulan Maiu tinan 2002.
English (eng): Timor-Leste gained its independence on the 20th of May 2002.
Mambai (mgm): Timor-Leste et ni independensia ni lelo 20 hul maiu ton 2002.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u lisensiatura kona ba jestaun finansas iha Unpaz.
English (eng): have a degree in financial management from Unpaz.
Mambai (mgm): Au lisensiatura ni jestaun finanseira her Unpaz.

Tetun (tdt): Kleur ona la udan
English (eng): It hasn’t rained for a long time.
Mambai (mgm): Agi tel sus ba us.

Tetun (tdt): Iha 2017, Sr Xanana Gusmão mak Timor-leste nia negosiadór prinsipál
English (eng): In 2017, Mr Xanana Gusmão was Timor-Leste's chief negotiator
Mambai (mgm): Ni 2017 señor Xanana Gusmao pe sefi negosiador Timor-Leste ni.

Tetun (tdt): Agora dadaun sei imposivel atu konkretiza.
English (eng): For now it's impossible to make a reality.
Mambai (mgm): Agora imposivel konkretiza nam ta.

Tetun (tdt): Nia buka dezvia atensaun hosi problema ne'e.
English (eng): He tried to turn attention away from this problem.
Mambai (mgm): Urá glae dizvia atensaun das problema ta.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u kuandu ko'alia ba ó, tenke sé oin mai!
English (eng): When I'm talking to you, you must face me!
Mambai (mgm): Au quandu gase la o, o tenser pei ma.

Tetun (tdt): Labarik barak moras malária.
English (eng): Many children are sick with malaria.
Mambai (mgm): An-loba niri moras malaria.

Tetun (tdt): Husu ba inan-aman atu uza muskiteiru ba labarik sira.
English (eng): We ask parents to use mosquito nets for the children.
Mambai (mgm): Cug la ama ina ro uza muskateru la an-loba.

Tetun (tdt): Labarik ne'e foin hadeer
English (eng): This child has just woken up
Mambai (mgm): An ta hena ble.

Tetun (tdt): Uluk ema respeitu ó tanba ó servisu ho onestu, maibé agora ó-nia naran aat ona tanba ó na'ok.
English (eng): People used to respect you because you worked honestly, but now you have a bad reputation because you stole.
Mambai (mgm): Muna ro respeitu o des la o serbis onestu mas agora o gala foer des la o pnao.

Tetun (tdt): Ita la'o kalan, kuidadu rama ambon.
English (eng): If you go out at night, watch out for metal arrows.
Mambai (mgm): Se im lalai hoda hel, kuidad nor rama ambon.

Tetun (tdt): Iha loron santu-santa sira, koru baibain hatais mutin.
English (eng): On All Saints' day, the choir usually wears white.
Mambai (mgm): Ni lelban Santo nor Santa ni koru rom biasa uza buti.

Tetun (tdt): Ami-nia uma kloot loos, ema barak bá la di'ak.
English (eng): Our house is very narrow, so not many people can go.
Mambai (mgm): Am uma mar lepa, ara pe ro niri ma ba kode.

Tetun (tdt): Ami-nia mestra hakerek pergunta iha kuadru laran.
English (eng): Our teacher wrote questions on the board.
Mambai (mgm): Am mestra kerek pergunta ni kuadru.

Tetun (tdt): Ema ne'e ko'alia arbiru de'it.
English (eng): This person is talking rubbish.
Mambai (mgm): Ro rai gase arbiru lea.

Tetun (tdt): Han ka seidauk?
English (eng): Have you eaten yet?
Mambai (mgm): Mua tel sus ka hihei?

Tetun (tdt): Ita isin krekas loos!
English (eng): You're so skinny!
Mambai (mgm): O eta mruma dlo.

Tetun (tdt): Maria eskola iha Dili.
English (eng): Maria went to school in Dili.
Mambai (mgm): Maria eskola ni Dili.

Tetun (tdt): Señora Leta ohin bá vizita oan-kiak sira iha madre sira iha Comoro.
English (eng): Today Mrs. Leta went to visit the orphans at the nuns in Comoro.
Mambai (mgm): Señora Leta vizita an kia ni madre rom um ni Comoro.

Tetun (tdt): Horiseik Julia bá merkadu.
English (eng): Yesterday Julia went to the market.
Mambai (mgm): Narua Julia la merkadu.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u foin aprende lori karreta.
English (eng): I've just learned to drive.
Mambai (mgm): Au hina aprende od kareta.

Tetun (tdt): Nu'udar ema foin-sa'e, ha'u gosta duni aprende buat barak.
English (eng): As a young person, I really like to learn many things.
Mambai (mgm): Man ro hin sae, au gosta aprende nam niri.

Tetun (tdt): Ohin ami komemora loron Internasionál Direitus Umanus nian iha distritu tolu.
English (eng): Today we are commemorating International Human Rights day in three districts.
Mambai (mgm): Napai am komemora lelban internasiol Direitus Umanus ni distritu tel.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u sei komprende lalais karik ita fó ezemplu ne'ebé di'ak.
English (eng): I will understand quickly if you give good examples.
Mambai (mgm): Au hei komprende hur hur, se o ne ezemplu kode.

Tetun (tdt): Ami hela iha ne'e tinan rua nulu resin ona.
English (eng): We have lived here for over twenty years.
Mambai (mgm): Am hela ni gia paglau tel sus to runolu.

Tetun (tdt): Favor fotokopia dokumentu ne'e.
English (eng): Please make a photocopy of this document.
Mambai (mgm): Favor id fotokopi kek dokumentu rai.

Tetun (tdt): Polísia tenke hala'o sira nia knaar ho imparsiál no neutru.
English (eng): The police must carry out their work impartially and neutrally.
Mambai (mgm): Polisia tenser pun rom ni serbis imparsial nor netral.

Tetun (tdt): Hori kalan grupu deskoñesidu ataka diretór nia uma.
English (eng): Last night a group of unknown people attacked the director’s house.
Mambai (mgm): Nam hoda grupu deskoñesidu serang diretor ni um.

Tetun (tdt): Formasaun ne'e nia objetivu prinsipál mak atu ajuda mestre sira hanorin ho métodu interativu.
English (eng): The main objective of this training is to help teachers to teach using interactive methods.
Mambai (mgm): Objetibu prinsipal formasaun ta ni peajuda profesor rom uza metodu interativu.

Tetun (tdt): La bele hirus beibeik; se lae, ferik lailais.
English (eng): Don’t get angry all the time; otherwise you’ll grow old quickly.
Mambai (mgm): Belika brus trus, ba ga mai hur-hur.

Tetun (tdt): Eis titulares Parlamentu Nasionál simu pensaun vitalísia.
English (eng): Former members of the National Parliament receive life-long pensions.
Mambai (mgm): Eis titulares Parlamentu Nasional sim pensaun vitalisia.

Tetun (tdt): Halo oinsá mak besi aat ne'e sai fali katana ne'ebé di'ak no kro'at?
English (eng): How could this old metal become a good sharp machete?
Mambai (mgm): Pun mambae pe bes klao ra sai sul la katan kode no haci.

Tetun (tdt): Luis, ó ajuda bá sosa sigarru masu ida.
English (eng): Luis, go and buy a packet of cigarettes.
Mambai (mgm): Luis, ajuda la al bal sigaru masu id.

Tetun (tdt): Ita tenke prepara planu ba tinan ne'e.
English (eng): We need to prepare a plan for this year.
Mambai (mgm): It tenser prepara planu la ton rai.

Tetun (tdt): Ohin iha ezame Portugues, mestre lee fraze sanulu.
English (eng): Today in the Portuguese exam, the teacher read ten sentences.
Mambai (mgm): Napai ni ezame Portuges mestre le fraze sagul.

Tetun (tdt): Ema sira ne'e akuza diretór dehan nia halo korrupsaun.
English (eng): These people accused the director of corruption.
Mambai (mgm): Ro ser gia akuza diretor tou ne urá pun korupsaun.

Tetun (tdt): Ami estuda la di'ak tanba labarik sira barullu loos.
English (eng): We can’t study effectively because the children are so noisy.
Mambai (mgm): Am estuda bakode des la an-loba ro mar barullu.

Tetun (tdt): Loron baileet imi la besik igreja, tempu agonia ona mak imi buka padre.
English (eng): Normally you don't go near a church, but when someone is close to death you go and look for a priest.
Mambai (mgm): Lelban biasa im ba gos amu tempu agunia pe im gos amu.

Tetun (tdt): Ha'u tenke fó han ba ha'u-nia família tanba sira hotu la servisu.
English (eng): I have to support my family because none of them have a job.
Mambai (mgm): Au tenser fo an au familia des la rom ba serbis met.

Tetun (tdt): Ita fuma sigarru loron ida lolon hira?
English (eng): How many cigarettes do you smoke in a day?
Mambai (mgm): Lelban id o sul sigaru pil?

Tetun (tdt): António kuandu hemu tua gosta halo arbiru.
English (eng): When António drinks alcohol, he likes to act without restraint.
Mambai (mgm): Antonio kuandu en nau sus gosta pun problema.

Tetun (tdt): Nia sosa hena mesak karu-karu de'it.
English (eng): She bought a variety of cloths, all of which are expensive.
Mambai (mgm): Urá al hena mes karun lea.
